articles.title: Woman cries foul after realising label on chicken sold in NTUC FairPrice is inaccurate - AsiaOne
articles.description: With the ongoing backlash against the New York Times' recipe of Singaporean chicken curry, the topic of chicken has been on the boil lately. This time around, a local supermarket has come under fire even before the poultry hit the stove. A woman cried foul on…
articles.content:

articles.title: Ah Girls Go Army rakes in impressive $1.28m at box office despite reviews - AsiaOne
articles.description: Jack Neo's latest Lunar New Year movie Ah Girls Go Army (AGGA) has earned an impressive $1.28 million at the Singapore box office as of Feb 3. The film, which opened in cinemas just two days prior with sneak previews from Jan 28, was played on 119 screens ove…
